Class ApplicationTest

java.lang.Object
application.ApplicationTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class ApplicationTest extends Object
The ApplicationTests class contains JUnit test cases to verify the functionality of various features of the DatabaseHelper class (e.g., user management, invitation codes, OTP, question and answer operations, and review/messaging functionality).

      @BeforeEach public void setUp() throws SQLException
      Sets up the test environment by initializing the DatabaseHelper and connecting to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

      Tears down the test environment by closing the database connection.
